content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>  <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xml:lang="en"       xmlns:scast="http://sciflo.jpl.nasa.gov/serviceCasting/2009v1">       <title>General URL-based Web Services</title>       <subtitle>General URL-based Web services from NSIDC</subtitle>       <link rel="self" href="http://nsidc.org/feeds/services/general_services_feed.xml"/>       <updated>2010-09-01T08:17:03.721649Z</updated>       <author>             <name>Timy Gonzalez</name>             <email>nsidc@nsidc.org</email>       </author>       <id>uri:http://nsidc.org/feeds/services/general_services_feed.xml</id>        <entry>             <title>PIC Badge API - Badge Types</title>             <id>uri:http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/</id>             <updated>2010-09-01T17:17:03.721649Z</updated>             <summary>This API helps you find the names and IDs of the licences currently offered by the PIC.</summary>             <scast:serviceType>Simple/HTTP</scast:serviceType>             <!-- Possible service types are: SOAP, REST, OGC.WXS, OpenSearch, GUI, or [yours].  -->             <category schema="scast"                   term="data PIC badge share web services restful license polar commons API"/>    <link type="text/html ; charset=utf-8" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceEndpoint" type="application/XML" title="Server endpoint"                   href="http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceDocumentation" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us"                   title="Service documentation" href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <content type="xhtml"> </content> </entry>  <entry>             <title>PIC Badge API - Fields for PIC_CC_ZERO badge.</title>             <id>uri:http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_zero</id>             <updated>2010-09-01T17:17:03.721649Z</updated>             <summary>This API defines the specific fields for the PIC_CC_ZERO badge.</summary>             <scast:serviceType>Simple/HTTP</scast:serviceType>             <!-- Possible service types are: SOAP, REST, OGC.WXS, OpenSearch, GUI, or [yours].  -->             <category schema="scast"                   term="data PIC badge share web services restful license polar commons API"/>    <link type="text/html; charset=utf-8" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceEndpoint" type="application/XML" title="Server endpoint"                   href="http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_zero"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceDocumentation" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us"                   title="Service documentation" href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <content type="xhtml"> </content> </entry>  <entry>             <title>PIC Badge API - Fields for PIC_CC_BY badge.</title>             <id>uri:http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_by</id>             <updated>2010-09-01T17:17:03.721649Z</updated>             <summary>This API defines the specific fields for the PIC_CC_BY badge.</summary>             <scast:serviceType>Simple/HTTP</scast:serviceType>             <!-- Possible service types are: SOAP, REST, OGC.WXS, OpenSearch, GUI, or [yours].  -->             <category schema="scast"                   term="data PIC badge share web services restful license polar commons API"/>    <link type="text/html; charset=utf-8" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceEndpoint" type="application/XML" title="Server endpoint"                   href="http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_by"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceDocumentation" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us"                   title="Service documentation" href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <content type="xhtml"> </content> </entry>  <entry>             <title>PIC Badge API - Generate a PIC_CC_BY badge.</title>             <id>uri:http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_by/issue</id>             <updated>2010-09-01T17:17:03.721649Z</updated>             <summary>This API generates and returns a PIC_CC_BY badge in HTML or XML format, based on the information you provide. </summary>             <scast:serviceType>Simple/HTTPPOST</scast:serviceType>             <!-- Possible service types are: SOAP, REST, OGC.WXS, OpenSearch, GUI, or [yours].  -->             <category schema="scast"                   term="data PIC badge share web services restful license polar commons API"/>    <link type="text/html; charset=utf-8" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceEndpoint" type="application/XML" title="Server endpoint"                   href="http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_by/issue"/>             <link rel="scast:serviceDocumentation" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us"                   title="Service documentation" href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" xml:lang="en-us" title="Service documentation"                   href="http://nsidc.org/api/badger.html"/>             <content type="xhtml"> </content> </entry>  <entry>             <title>PIC Badge API - Generate a PIC_CC_ZERO badge.</title>             <id>uri:http://nsidc.org/picbadgeapi/licenses/pic_cc_zero/issue</id>             <updated>2010-09-01T17:17:03.721649Z</updated>             <summary>This API generates and returns a PIC_CC_ZERO badge in HTML or XML format, based on the information you provide. </summary>             <scast:serviceType>Simple/HTTPPOST</scast:serviceType>             <!-- Possible service types are: SOAP, REST, OGC.WXS, OpenSearch, GUI, or [yours].  -->             <category schema="scast"                   term="data PIC badge share web services restful license polar commons API"/>    <link type="text/html;
